result.execSummary:
The defendant Lindsey G Krueger was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Forgery, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.38(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Lindsey G Krueger

records.addlTxt: Defendant's probation revoked - sentenced to time served on 12-14-17; unpaid court obligations of $500 and supervision fees of $140

Defendant Lindsey G Krueger in court, in custody with attorney Ryan T. Frank.  William Albert Appleton appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Interpreter Sandy Peplinski present. Sworn. Sentencing is agreed upon. Court sentenced the defendant to serve 1 year in jail. A civil judgment will be entered for all unpaid financial obligations. Jail credit 364 days. Atty Frank requested the court only use 274 days for this case. Judge denied the request. This is a time served sentence.
from probation agent with revocation paperwork

Defendant Lindsey G Krueger in court, in custody with attorney Randall M. Holtz.  Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Interpreter De Malski was by video.  Interpreter sworn in.  Cases called:  14CF313 & 14CF314.  Reading waived.  Problems arose from video.  Defendant read proceedings from court reporters screen.  $2000.00 cash bond each case for a total of $4000.00.  No contact with L.K.   Not to go upon the premises of Our House (assisted living)  in Portage WI and must stay at least 1 block away.  Not to possess or consume any alcoholic beverages or any controlled substances without a valid prescription.  Standard felony conditions.  Waives time limits.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 18, 2014 at 01:20 pm.  Hearing scheduled for September 9, 2014 at 02:45 pm.
